data.title: Lulu Keating
data.meta_description: Award-winning Dawson City-based filmmaker Lulu Keating brings over 40 years of professional experience to the table.
data.text:
Award-winning Dawson City-based filmmaker Lulu Keating brings over 40 years of professional experience to the table.

Keating has written and directed feature-length drama, television documentary, animation and shorts projects, producing at least one film a year. Born in Antigonish, Nova Scotia, she studied at Saint Francis Xavier University. At the Vancouver School of Art, she discovered a love of film. Keating attended the film program at Ryerson in Toronto before embarking on filmmaking at the Atlantic Filmmakerâ€™s Co-op. In 1985, she incorporated her company Red Snapper Films Limited and directed a documentary in Japan.
